        • public static java.lang.reflect.Field getDeclaredField(java.lang.Class javaClass, java.lang.String propertyName)

          Get a declared field, searching super classes for the field if it is not found in the class.

          Parameters:
          javaClass - The class to search.
          propertyName - The name of the field.
          Returns:
          The field, or null if it couldn't be found.
